to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view

Class VirtualJoystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view.VirtualJoystick

  • public class VirtualJoystick
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent one joystick on the VirtualJoystickView.
    Author:
    sven

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Is the Joystick enabled? Default is false.
        Returns:
        Is the Joystick enabled?
        See Also:
        setEnabled(boolean)

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables ode disables the joystick. If its not enabled, the joystick can't moved and won't drawn.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Enable it?

        private boolean isOverAndHasNoPointer(int pointerIndex,
                            MotionEvent event)
        Checks if the Touch Event is over the area of this joystick.
        Parameters:
        pointerIndex - The Touch Pointer
        event - The MotionEvent
        Returns:
        True, if its over.
